entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
